problem: What is $2121_3 - 212_3?$ Express your answer in base 3.
model_solution:
Step 1: Convert both numbers to base 10.
$2121_3 = 2 \times 3^3 + 1 \times 3^2 + 2 \times 3^1 + 1 \times 3^0$
$212_3 = 2 \times 3^2 + 1 \times 3^1 + 2 \times 3^0$
Step 2: Perform the subtraction in base 10.
$2 \times 3^3 + 1 \times 3^2 + 2 \times 3^1 + 1 \times 3^0 - (2 \times 3^2 + 1 \times 3^1 + 2 \times 3^0)$
Step 3: 
$2 \times 3^3 + 1 \times 3^2 + 2 \times 3^1 + 1 \times 3^0 - (2 \times 3^2 + 1 \times 3^1 + 2 \times 3^0) = 54 + 9 + 6 + 1 - (18 + 3 + 2)$
$54 + 9 + 6 + 1 - (18 + 3 + 2) = 70 - 23$
$70 - 23 = 47$
Convert the result back to base 3.
Convert the result back to base 3.
$47 = 122_3$
$47 = 122_3$
$47 = 122_3$
